divs: Sighting Details Your triangle plane show up again, 6:00 PM, over my apt heading to Winter Spring,FL maybe Sanford airport. but this time it almost crash with a incoming flight to Orlando it past behind it a approximate 0.5 miles below it. Plane look like a 737 or A330 on a landing path. low flying and no noise, no exhaust, triangle shape is very visible. must be low radar signature, because the plane didn't see it.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Apopka
There were no other sightings in Apopka on or around December 4th 2012
